title: 1 click = 1 action correct?
body:
so call me a %%%% or whatever or band wagon teemo hater but I just had a match with a teemo who had a macro which upon auto attacking
they always laughed, upon placing a shroom they flashed their MR[(which was 7)pretty sure this dude is the type of person who tries to tilt the enemy so they can win], and upon using Q it was always a joke or taunt(it flip flopped between the two). Now i get the game is meant for "casual fun" but tbh is this even allowed it's not the biggest hindrance but I have 2 choices either mute character volume, or just deal with this 
type of BM which I'd prefer the latter.
Edit: So apparently this isn't bannable but if you can't beat em join em I'll be looking up how to do this as well considering it does seem fun and dives into the psychology of league

replies.body: Riot intentionally added Singed's laugh to his fling. I don't think they're against using a cosmetic emote with an action.
Well, everyone has their versions of fun in a game, but if that were to be something i'd say "unsportsmanlike conduct" if you're a type of person who dislike that type of play.

isn't it also use of 3rd party programs too? due to the fact that their TOS quite literally says 1 click = 1 action? I've even heard of certain mouses and keyboards being bannable due to their ability to macro with their software
Maybe if they actually are, you can Bind things together i believe in the game, i know my friend likes to bind his mastery when he plays cancer champs, but i don't really know anything on the matter.
well I have auto attack move on left click and you have to go to the .json file(perssisted settings) so apparently it might have something to do with that
It's not a 3rd party program? You're literally configuring the code to do that.
I find that fucking hilarious, i'm going to figure out how to do this

it is funny yes but it's also quite annoying and bannable if i might add I just reread the TOS and upon every auto attack they laughed with no delay so while i do think it is funny it's also prep for even further use of scripts/macros such as dodge, fog of war disabler, ect
I'm fairly certain that when you mute them, you also mute any and all emote sound from them.
sadly it doesn't I have the habit of /mute all at the start of my games just because I'd rather communicate thru pings and to not give myself a reason to type
Give me his summoner name, i'm gifting that guy.
no because then I'd technically be naming and shaming you can contact me somehow and I could discretely relay their info to you because I'm all in the spirit of giving and all

and if it's not bannable then I just feel stupid tbh but can accept when I'm wrong but i still don't want disclose names due to the mob mentality hate for teemo players but i sent you a friend request
